content:
```
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0). The furnace processes iron ore into iron plates.

### Iron Chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of an iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5).

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- The agent is attempting to craft iron chests but failing due to a lack of iron plates. Ensure sufficient iron plates are available in the inventory before attempting to craft iron chests. Monitor the iron plate production and adjust mining or smelting operations to maintain an adequate supply.

# NAMESPACE
```
